an8.64:3.2: Note that this passage clarifies exactly what the stock phrase rupani passami: seeing visions of the gods. Translating it as “see forms” hardly captures this.
an8.64:7.12: There’s no witness in MS or PTS for imassa kammassa vipakena here, but BB includes it. It’s either an oversight, or he thinks it was unintentionally lost by abbreviation.
